briefdescription.para: Coordinate is a longitude value.
Coordinate is a latitude value.
Annotation coordinate type.
Draw annotations horizontally.
Draw annotations vertically, ascending.
Draw annotations vertically, descending.
Annotations follow the boundary direction.
Direction of grid annotations.
Decimal degrees, use - for S/W coordinates.
Degree/minutes, use NSEW suffix.
Degree/minutes/seconds, use NSEW suffix.
Decimal degrees, use NSEW suffix.
Degree/minutes, use - for S/W coordinates.
Degree/minutes, with minutes using leading zeros where required.
Degree/minutes/seconds, use - for S/W coordinates.
Degree/minutes/seconds, with minutes using leading zeros where required.
Custom expression-based format.
Format for displaying grid annotations.
Draw annotations inside the map frame.
Draw annotations outside the map frame.
Position for grid annotations.
Left border.
Right border.
Bottom border.
Top border.
Border sides for annotations.
Show both latitude and longitude annotations/divisions.
Show latitude/y annotations/divisions only.
Show longitude/x annotations/divisions only.
No annotations.
Display settings for grid annotations and frames.
Left side of map.
Right side of map.
Top side of map.
Bottom side of map.
Flags for controlling which side of the map a frame is drawn on.
Disable grid frame.
Black/white pattern.
Tick markers drawn inside map frame.
Tick markers drawn outside map frame.
Tick markers drawn both inside and outside the map frame.
Simple solid line frame.
Simple solid line frame, with nautical style diagonals on corners.
Black/white pattern, with nautical style diagonals on corners.
Style for grid frame.
Draw line crosses at intersections of grid lines.
Draw markers at intersections of grid lines.
No grid lines over the map, only draw frame and annotations.
Grid drawing style.
Grid units follow map units.
Grid units in millimeters.
Grid units in centimeters.
Unit for grid values.
Distance between map frame and annotation.
Divisions for frame on bottom map side.

Annotation display mode for bottom map side.
Annotation position for bottom map side (inside / outside)
Font for grid line annotation.
Font color for grid coordinates.
Digits after the dot.
Grid line interval in x-direction (map units)
Grid line interval in y-direction (map units)
Grid line offset in x-direction.

Solid or crosses.

True if coordinate values should be drawn.

Constructor for QgsLayoutItemMapGrid.

parameterdescription.para: QgsLayoutItemMap the grid is attached to

briefdescription.para: Returns the direction for drawing frame annotations, on the specified side of the map.
Returns the display mode for the grid annotations on a specified side of the map frame.

detaileddescription.para:
This property also specifies whether annotations have been disabled from a side of the map frame.
border
side of map for annotations
display mode for grid annotations
setAnnotationDisplay()

briefdescription.para: Returns whether annotations are shown for the grid.
Returns the expression used for drawing grid annotations.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used when annotationFormat() is QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::CustomFormat.
setAnnotationExpression()

briefdescription.para: Returns the font used for drawing grid annotations.
Returns the font color used for drawing grid annotations.
Returns the format for drawing grid annotations.
Returns the distance between the map frame and annotations.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are in layout units.
setAnnotationFrameDistance()

briefdescription.para: Returns the position for the grid annotations on a specified side of the map frame.
Returns the coordinate precision for grid annotations, which is the number of decimal places shown when drawing grid annotations.
Retrieves the blending mode used for drawing the grid.
Calculates the maximum distance the grid extends beyond the QgsLayoutItemMap's item rect.

detaileddescription.para:
This method calculates the distance for each side of the map item separately.
maxExtension()

briefdescription.para: This method needs to be reimplemented in all classes which implement this interface and return an expression context.
Retrieves the length (in layout units) of the cross segments drawn for the grid.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles.
setCrossLength()

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the CRS for the grid.
Draws the item on to a destination painter.
Returns the type of grid divisions which are used for frames on a specified side of the map.
Retrieves the first fill color for the grid frame.
Retrieves the second fill color for the grid frame.
Sets the grid frame Margin (in layout units).

detaileddescription.para:
This property controls distance between the map frame and the grid frame.
setFrameMargin()
QGIS 3.6

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the color of the stroke drawn in the grid frame.
Retrieves the width of the stroke drawn in the grid frame.
Returns the flags which control which sides of the map item the grid frame is drawn on.
Returns the grid frame style.
Gets the grid frame width in layout units.

detaileddescription.para:
This property controls how wide the grid frame is. The size of the line outlines drawn in the frame can be retrieved via the framePenSize method.
setFrameWidth()

briefdescription.para: Returns the interval between grid lines in the x-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are retrieved through the units() method.
setIntervalX()
intervalY()

briefdescription.para: Returns the interval between grid lines in the y-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are retrieved through the units() method.
setIntervalY()
intervalX()

briefdescription.para: Returns the line symbol used for drawing grid lines.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Solid or QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles.
setLineSymbol()
markerSymbol()
style()
not available in Python bindings

briefdescription.para: Returns the line symbol used for drawing grid lines.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Solid or QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles.
setLineSymbol()
markerSymbol()
style()

briefdescription.para: Returns the marker symbol used for drawing grid points.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with a QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Markers style.
setMarkerSymbol()
lineSymbol()
style()
not available in Python bindings

briefdescription.para: Returns the marker symbol used for drawing grid points.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with a QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Markers style.
setMarkerSymbol()
lineSymbol()
style()

briefdescription.para: Calculates the maximum distance the grid extends beyond the QgsLayoutItemMap's item rect (in layout units).
Returns the offset for grid lines in the x-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are retrieved through the units() method.
setOffsetX()
offsetY()

briefdescription.para: Returns the offset for grid lines in the y-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are retrieved through the units() method.
setOffsetY()
offsetX()

memberdef.name: readXml

briefdescription.para: Sets the map item state from a DOM document, where element is the DOM node corresponding to a 'LayoutMapGrid' tag.
Sets the direction for drawing frame annotations for the specified map side.
Sets the direction for drawing all frame annotations.
Sets what types of grid annotations should be drawn for a specified side of the map frame, or whether grid annotations should be disabled for the side.
Sets whether annotations should be shown for the grid.
Sets the expression used for drawing grid annotations.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used when annotationFormat() is QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::CustomFormat.
annotationExpression()

briefdescription.para: Sets the font used for drawing grid annotations.
Sets the font color used for drawing grid annotations.
Sets the format for drawing grid annotations.
Sets the distance between the map frame and annotations.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are layout units.
annotationFrameDistance()

briefdescription.para: Sets the position for the grid annotations on a specified side of the map frame.
Sets the coordinate precision for grid annotations.

detaileddescription.para:
The precision indicates the number of decimal places to show when drawing grid annotations.
annotationPrecision()

briefdescription.para: Sets the blending mode used for drawing the grid.
Sets the length (in layout units) of the cross segments drawn for the grid.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles.
crossLength()

briefdescription.para: Sets the crs for the grid.
Sets what type of grid divisions should be used for frames on a specified side of the map.
Sets the first fill color used for the grid frame.
Sets the second fill color used for the grid frame.
Sets the grid frame margin (in layout units).

detaileddescription.para:
This property controls distance between the map frame and the grid frame.
frameMargin()
QGIS 3.6

briefdescription.para: Sets the color of the stroke drawn in the grid frame.
Sets the width of the stroke drawn in the grid frame.
Sets whether the grid frame is drawn for a certain side of the map item.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to draw grid frame on that side of the map

briefdescription.para: Sets flags for grid frame sides.

detaileddescription.para:
Setting these flags controls which sides of the map item the grid frame is drawn on.
setFrameSideFlag()
frameSideFlags()
testFrameSideFlag()

briefdescription.para: Sets the grid frame style.
Sets the grid frame width (in layout units).

detaileddescription.para:
This property controls how wide the grid frame is. The size of the line outlines drawn in the frame is controlled through the setFramePenSize method.
frameWidth()

briefdescription.para: Sets the color of grid lines.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Solid or QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles. For more control over grid line appearance, use setLineSymbol instead.
setLineSymbol()
setGridLineWidth()

briefdescription.para: Sets the width of grid lines (in layout units).

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Solid or QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles. For more control over grid line appearance, use setLineSymbol instead.
setLineSymbol()
setGridLineColor()

briefdescription.para: Sets the interval between grid lines in the x-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are controlled through the setUnits method
setIntervalY()
intervalX()

briefdescription.para: Sets the interval between grid lines in the y-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are controlled through the setUnits method
setIntervalX()
intervalY()

briefdescription.para: Sets the line symbol used for drawing grid lines.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Solid or QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Cross styles. Ownership of symbol is transferred to the grid.
lineSymbol()
setMarkerSymbol()
setStyle()

briefdescription.para: Sets the marker symbol used for drawing grid points.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used for grids with a QgsLayoutItemMapGrid::Markers style. Ownership of symbol is transferred to the grid.
markerSymbol()
setLineSymbol()
setStyle()

briefdescription.para: Sets the offset for grid lines in the x-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are controlled through the setUnits method.
setOffsetY()
offsetX()

briefdescription.para: Sets the offset for grid lines in the y-direction.

detaileddescription.para:
The units are controlled through the setUnits method.
setOffsetX()
offsetY()

briefdescription.para: Sets the grid style, which controls how the grid is drawn over the map's contents.
Sets the unit to use for grid measurements such as the interval and offset for grid lines.
Returns the grid's style, which controls how the grid is drawn over the map's contents.
Tests whether the grid frame should be drawn on a specified side of the map item.

simplesect.para: true if grid frame should be drawn for that side of the map

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for grid measurements such as the interval and offset for grid lines.
Returns true if the item is drawn using advanced effects, such as blend modes.
